REUTERS.UNKNOWN: E F f2605 reute r f BC-FIRST-TORONTO-COMPLET 04-07 0059

TEXT.TITLE: FIRST TORONTO COMPLETES ISSUE
TEXT.BODY: <First Toronto Capital Corp> said it completed an issue of a five mln dlrs convertible debenture to Arcalex B.V., a Dutch corporation that owns 54.3 pct of First Toronto's outstanding common shares. The debenture is convertible to one mln common shares of First Toronto for a period of five years. Reuter
